article_text: The poll, released just as the two major candidates prepare to square off Friday in a debate hosted by Spanish-language network Telemundo, is the latest spot of good survey news for Charlie Crist.

article_metadata.title: Poll: Florida Hispanic voters strongly back Charlie Crist, Medicaid expansion | Miami Herald
